trans-unit.source: Provides access to state pertinent to all HTTP modules relevant to federated authentication in the web application.
Gets the claims authorization module used by the web application.
Gets the singleton <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration"></xref> instance used by the HTTP modules in this web application.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> by an event handler for the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfigurationCreated"></xref> event.
Occurs when the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration*> property is accessed for the first time by one of the HTTP modules in the web application.

The FederationConfigurationCreated event is raised when the first HTTP module in the web application references <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A> property.

The first access of the this property causes a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> object to be created and initialized from the [\<federationConfiguration\>](../Topic/%3CfederationConfiguration%3E.md) element in the configuration file.

You can access the newly created <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> object through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationCreatedEventArgs.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property in an event handler in order to examine or modify it before it is used to provide initialization for any of the HTTP modules configured for the application.
Gets the session authentication module (SAM) used by the web application.
Gets the WS-Federation Authentication Module (WSFAM) used by the web application.
